content: i hope you like my pattern for #wafflesmittens and i m happy to share it for free waffles are fingerless mittens consisting of a textured pattern using only knit and purl stitches the pattern is a simple 4 row repeat which creates a waffle effect starting at the wrist and continuing for the length of the mittens they include a thumb gusset which continues with the same waffle stitch detail the pattern includes 3 sizing options for women s hand sizes knitted using dk weight yarn the pattern could also be resized by using a different yarn and/or needle size the mittens are knitted on circular needles using the magic loop method or dpn s if that is your preference gauge waffle stitch swatch 4 x 4 10cm x 10cm 28 sts x 42 row 3mm us 2 5 needles sizes women s hand sizes small 6 5-7 16 5cm-18cm medium 7-7 5 18cm-19cm large 7 5-8 19cm-20cm finished mitten length 7 18 cm materials 60-85g dk weight yarn 3mm needles circular needles or dpn s tapestry needle for weaving in ends happy knitting
